alert.note: Alert for Saipan (Marianas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 26 at 8:06PM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...URBAN AND SMALL STREAM FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9PM CHST... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected at Saipan. * WHEN...Until 900 PM ChST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 945 AM UTC, satellite estimates indicate heavy rain is moving towards Saipan. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.5 to 1.4 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Garapan, Dandan, China Town, Tanapag, As Mahetog, Koblerville, Chalan Kanoa I, San Antonio, Chalan Kanoa II, Chalan Kanoa III, San Roque, Kagman, Chalan Kanoa IV, Kagman III, Gualo Rai, Afetnas, Chalan Piao, Fananganan, Chalan Laulau and Chalan Kiya. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
